philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.intro: Studio Marine is the strategic laboratory that conceived Sargon, taking inspiration from what the name has carried since ancient times: a journey not of conquest, but of connection.
philosophy.subtitle: Sargon is the model of luxury travel in Sardinia â€” not ostentatious, but rooted.

luxury.title: True luxury is not seen. It is felt.
items: It's not the number of cabins, but in the silence that embraces the open sea.
It's not the brand of the engine, but the respect with which we use it.
It's not in counted time, but in the freedom to change your mind, follow a dolphin, stop where the water becomes crystal, follow the breath of the sea.

minimalism.title: Less is more
items: Few guests on board. Few landings, but experienced in depth.
Less noise, more silence to listen to.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
items: A captain who knows every cliff by name, not an autopilot.
True stories told at the bow, not pre-packaged itineraries.
Conscious luxury: choosing what truly matters and letting go of the rest.
